content:
/>
VIII.iv.8.B.3.b
.
Awarding a Hospitalization Rating for Multiple SC Conditions
In cases in which two or more SC disabilities exist for which the provisions of
38 CFR 4.29
would apply, increase the evaluation of only
one
of the disabilities to 100 percent.
title: M21-1, Part VIII, Subpart iv, Chapter 8, Section B - Hospitalization Ratings Under 38 CFR 4.29
citation: Part VIII, Subpart iv, Chapter 8, Section B
